com.satori.rtm.model

Class PduRaw

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.satori.rtm.model.Pdu<AnyJson>
      • com.satori.rtm.model.PduRaw

  • public class PduRaw
extends Pdu<AnyJson>
    A Protocol Data Unit (PDU) with a typeless user payload.

    This class stores general PDU structure without knowledge about the payload type. The payload is stored as raw JSON and converted to specific class type on demand.

    Note that a PDU payload is the same as the message element in the PDU specification:

    Sample PDU Specification 

     {
    "action": "<service>/<operation>/<response>",
    "body": {
         "channel": "<channel name>",
         "message": "<JSON-encoded message>" // payload
    },
    "id": <PDU id> | "<PDU id>"
 }

    This class is also provided in order to make future extensions to PDU functionality without affecting existing implementations.
